definitions: attachment or commitment to a person, cause, or belief

examples.text: he moved to Avignon and won the adherence of the French king

shortDefinitions: attachment or commitment to person, cause, or belief

definitions: the quality or process of sticking fast to an object or surface

examples.text: observing the adherence of the seeds to clothing prompted the development of Velcro

shortDefinitions: quality or process of sticking fast to object or surface
